gloss: a large scale offensive (more than a counterattack) undertaken by a defending force to seize the initiative from an attacking force / close-in firing by one unit against an enemy engaged by another unit

(usually followed by `with') united in effort as if in a league / a body of people united in opposing something / a cry of approval as from an audience at the end of great performance / a loud utterance; often in protest or opposition / a strong declaration of protest / hold one's ground; maintain a position; be steadfast or upright

a formally arranged gathering / a large gathering of people / a race between dogs; usually an occasion for betting on the outcome / a race between people riding bicycles / a raucous gathering / an occasion on which a winner is selected from among two or more contestants
a formal event performed on a special occasion / a formally arranged gathering / a large formal assembly
a formally arranged gathering / a hall where many people can congregate / come and gather for a public event
a dark-skinned race / a race between dogs; usually an occasion for betting on the outcome / ride a racehorse as a professional jockey
